titles.title: To authorize the construction of a replacement lock at the Chickamauga Lock and Dam, Tennessee.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

term.name: Federal aid to water resources development

bill.summary: 10/3/2002--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to carry out a project for inland navigation, Chickamauga Lock and Dam, Tennessee, that includes a replacement lock.
